A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed it...but was disappointed with what I thought might happen and what did....the humor was my kind of humor...and there was maybe a few things that I had to just live with....Mary Poppins in space (Ploo Koon did this in CW) and Luke tossing the laser sword ... So much better the 2nd time after I could get over myself and my predictions and just enjoy the movie....plot holes...every Star Wars has plot holes!
